'''2.12.2''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on October 20, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Changed the Java Edition update process.
* Changed some customer service and management processes.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-23198}} - Formatting issue with text strings for operating systems and age rating within the upsell section for Java Edition.
* {{bug|MCL-23694}} - Microsoft Store is incorrectly referred to as "Windows Store" in four launcher strings.</onlyinclude>
